author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A novel set in the Deep South during the 1930s, focusing on racial injustice.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A novel about teenage angst and alienation.

title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
description: A novel about the history of the Buendia family in the fictional town of Macondo.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A novel set in the Roaring Twenties, focusing on the lives of wealthy New Yorkers.

title: Moby Dick
author: Herman Melville
description: A novel about a whaling voyage and the obsession of the captain to capture the white whale.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A novel about the societal expectations of women in the Georgian era.
